job.title: C++ Software Engineer/Software Architect
job.description:
The Simpleware team at Synopsys (Exeter, UK) develops state of the art software for the visualisation and analysis of 3D images (e.g., CT/MRI images) enabling engineers and researchers around the world to take their scan data to the next level (data analysis, link to CAD and simulation packages). Our customers range from international blue-chip corporations, research institutions to universities in fields as varied as medical (implants design, cardiovascular applications), materials analysis and industrial manufacturing.
For more information on the Simpleware team, please see http://www.synopsys.com/simpleware.html .
As a C++ software architect, you will be in charge of the design of existing and future applications developed by the team. You will also be involved in the implementation of new software features.
Exeter is a university city with excellent shopping and options for eating out, and is only 25 minutes from the sea and Dartmoor National Park. Exeter also has direct rail links to London and major cities in the UK and benefits from direct flights to a number of European cities.
You will be joining the Simpleware development team, a team with diverse expertise, experience and interests in software development, and will enjoy a creative and international work environment.
